ToDoEntryInfo.description:
入口信息： 1.当入口为IM时：单聊-{imUserId, title, imMessageList},
 群聊-{groupType, groupId, title, imMessageList} 2.当入口为动态时 {title, trendInfo}

type.description: 类型: 'GENERAL'-通用, 'ENGINEERING'-工程, 'SCIENTIFIC'-科研, 'FINANCE'-财务, 'OA'-人事, 'CA'-CA, 'PSI'-进销存, 'DETECTION'-检测, 'MARKET'-市场, 'BUSINESS'-商机

entry.description: 入口：GENERAL - 待办中心，IM - IM，TREND - 动态， USER_FEEDBACK - 商云问题反馈

identifier.description: 事件类型: CREATED-创建，CREATED_SUB-创建子待办，FORWARD-转办，UPDATED-更新，FINISHED-完成，REOPENED-重启，COMMENTED-评论，DELETED-删除，CLOSED-关闭
